response.original_title: Terry McMillan Presents: Preach, Pray, Love
response.overview: Charlie Jones, is a platinum-selling rapper whose provocative persona has fueled her career–and landed her in more than a little trouble. After a stint in prison, Charlie’s court-ordered community service places her in the path of Pastor Kyrus Owens.
response.title: Terry McMillan Presents: Preach, Pray, Love
